head.title: Apple Butter and Cream Cheese Spread

directions.step:
Place the cream cheese, apple butter, vanilla and cinnamon in the container of a food processor fitted with a metal blade. Process for 20 seconds, or till just smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides of the container, if necessary. Scrape the spread into a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate till slightly firm. NOTES : makes about 2/3 cup Source: Jewish Food Archives Poster: Linda Shapiro (lss@coconet.com)
